languages.text: "Значит, это дело закрыто. С вашего разрешения, я вернусь к своим обязанностям".
"Then this case is closed. With your permission, I will return to my duties."
languages.original_text: "Значит, это дело закрыто. С вашего разрешения, я вернусь к своим обязанностям".

traits.locale_text: "Then this case is closed. With your permission, I will return to my duties."

languages.text: 「では、この件はこれで終了です。許可をいただけるなら、職務に戻らせていただきます」
languages.original_text: "Then this case is closed. With your permission, I will return to my duties."

traits.locale_text: 「では、この件はこれで終了です。許可をいただけるなら、職務に戻らせていただきます」

languages.text: "Öyleyse bu mesele kapanmıştır. İzninizle görevimin başına döneceğim."
languages.original_text: "Then this case is closed. With your permission, I will return to my duties."

traits.locale_text: "Öyleyse bu mesele kapanmıştır. İzninizle görevimin başına döneceğim."

languages.text: «En ese caso, el caso queda cerrado. Con su permiso, volveré a mis labores».
languages.original_text: "Then this case is closed. With your permission, I will return to my duties."

traits.locale_text: «En ese caso, el caso queda cerrado. Con su permiso, volveré a mis labores».

languages.text: “既然如此，这个案子正式结案。如果你允许的话，我要回去工作了。”
languages.original_text: "Then this case is closed. With your permission, I will return to my duties."

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，这个案子正式结案。如果你允许的话，我要回去工作了。”

languages.text: « L'affaire est donc close. Avec votre permission, je vais reprendre mes tâches. »
languages.original_text: "Then this case is closed. With your permission, I will return to my duties."

traits.locale_text: « L'affaire est donc close. Avec votre permission, je vais reprendre mes tâches. »

languages.text: "Dann ist die Sache erledigt. Wenn Ihr gestattet, widme ich mich nun wieder meinen Pflichten."
languages.original_text: "Then this case is closed. With your permission, I will return to my duties."

traits.locale_text: "Dann ist die Sache erledigt. Wenn Ihr gestattet, widme ich mich nun wieder meinen Pflichten."
